```{r}
library(dplyr)

zp_2020 <- read.csv("data/strukturerhebung/2020_SE_RS_CSV/zp_2020.csv", sep = ';')

head(zp_2020)
```

```{r}
selected_df_2020 <- zp_2020 %>% select("SOCIOPROFGROUP")

head(selected_df_2020)
```

```{r}
zp_2020 <- zp_2020 %>% rename(SOCIOECONOMICGROUP = SOCIOPROFGROUP)

head(zp_2020)
```

```{r}
zp_2020 %>% select(SOCIOECONOMICGROUP) %>% head()
```
